title: And So It Begins, Sept 20th 2016
description: The Warren Markowitz Show, It's My World You Just Live In It. A soap box for Independent Ideas, current events and politics of the day. So what does it take to recognize that we are involved in a war that is going to determine our society, our freedoms and our future? The recent bombings in NYC and the rampage stabbing in MN are only small examples, but when you add them up with the shooting rampage in California and the numerous people leaving to fight for ISIS or to conduct jihad America must come to the only conclusion, her survival is more important than the lives of those that only wish to undermine her success for the purpose of advancing an archaic civil and political system. Podcast: Galtspeaks.com Contact: Radio@galtspeaks.com Follow us on twitter.com/radiomarkowitz & Facebook.com/radiomarkowitz Spreaker-www.spreaker.com/show/the-warren-markowitz-show & our new home on Redstatetalkradio.com Support the podcast, use the next level of autonomy, cryptocurrency: BTC: Azen7A8rsEwQ84SCB3ZsbuYALpNCGgqNc
dc:creator: Warren Markowitz
